column6:
The X-Men have only been reformed for mere days, and they're already in the middle of a national crisis. The Sentinels have been reactivated-mutants are once again hunted and killed like animals. But who's controlling them this time-and what does it have to do with the newly-formed Mutant Liberation Front?,2007,8
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Robert Kirkman | inker:Serge LaPointe | penciller (cover):Yanick Paquette | colorist:Stephane Peru
